title: To-Do List
description: A To-Do List App allows users to organize their daily tasks by creating, updating, and deleting to-do items. Tasks can be marked as complete or incomplete, and may include additional features like due dates, priority levels, and categories.

title: Student Management System
description: A Student Management System helps institutions manage student data, including registration, course enrollment, attendance, grades, and reports. Admins or teachers can update records, and students may view or edit their profiles.

title: User Registration and Login System
description: A User Registration and Login System enables users to sign up, log in, and access protected areas of an app. It includes features such as password encryption, session handling, and forgot-password functionality.
